content.rendered: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

excerpt.rendered:
With WooCommerce you can sell physical/shippable products as well as digital downloads: eBooks or Audio Books; Music; Event Tickets; Photography; Digital Design Assets; Videos and Courses; You name it …

Setting up a product as downloadable, activates additional fields where you can provide a downloadable file. After a successful purchase, customers are given a downloadable file as a link in the order notification email.

Read more about creating and managing downloadable products in the WooCommerce Documentation.
